import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import makeRequest from "../../../../api/axiosHttp"; import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import Swal from "sweetalert2"; import categoryApi from "../../../../api/categoryApi"; const Category = ({ onRemove, category }) => { const removeHandle = (id) => { Swal.fire({ title: "Bạn có chắc chắn muốn xóa?", text: "You won't be able to revert this!", icon: "warning", showCancelButton: true, confirmButtonColor: "#3085d6", cancelButtonColor: "#d33", confirmButtonText: "Yes, delete it!", }).then((result) => { if (result.value) { onRemove(id); Swal.fire("Deleted!", "Your file has been deleted.", "success"); } }); // onRemove(id); console.log(id); }; return (
